dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT :REPORT_TYPE eta_etd, :START_DATE start_dt, :END_DATE end_dt, REPLACE(:SHIPMENT_TYPE,'BOTH','ALL') export_import FROM DUAL

SELECT DISTINCT cv.departure_date, j.job_xid job_id, cv.charter_voyage_xid booking_id, j.attribute4 loc, sref.shipment_refnum_value ship_type, loc1.location_name shipper, TO_CHAR(cv.departure_date,'MM/DD/YYYY') etd, TO_CHAR(cv.actual_departure_date,'MM/DD/YYYY') atd, TO_CHAR(cv.arrival_date,'MM/DD/YYYY') eta, loc2.location_name carrier, (CASE WHEN loc4.location_name IS NULL THEN loc3.location_name ELSE loc4.location_name END) load_port, loc5.location_name discharge_port, loc6.location_name place_of_delivery, s.total_ship_unit_count || ' X ' || (CASE WHEN glog_util.remove_domain(s.first_equipment_group_gid) = '20FT_22GP' THEN '20''' WHEN glog_util.remove_domain(s.first_equipment_group_gid) = '20FT_22RE' THEN '20''''RF' WHEN glog_util.remove_domain(s.first_equipment_group_gid) = '20FT_22TG' THEN '20''''ISO' WHEN glog_util.remove_domain(s.first_equipment_group_gid) = '40FT_42GP' THEN '40''' WHEN glog_util.remove_domain(s.first_equipment_group_gid) = '40FT_45GP' THEN '40HC' WHEN glog_util.remove_domain(s.first_equipment_group_gid) = '45FT_L5GP' THEN '45''' WHEN glog_util.remove_domain(s.first_equipment_group_gid) = '40FT_45RE' THEN '40''''HCRF' WHEN glog_util.remove_domain(s.first_equipment_group_gid) = 'RO RO' THEN 'RORO' ELSE glog_util.remove_domain(s.first_equipment_group_gid) END) containers, TRIM(cv.voyage_name || ' ' || cvr1.charter_voyage_refnum_value) vessel_voyage, glog_util.remove_domain(sip2.involved_party_contact_gid) ops_manager FROM job j INNER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj ON j.job_gid = jorj.job_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON jorj.order_release_gid = ssul.order_release_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON sessuj.s_equipment_gid = ssej.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON ssej.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND s.transport_mode_gid = 'VESSEL-CO' AND s.is_primary = 'Y' AND s.perspective = 'B' INNER JOIN shipment_refnum sref ON s.shipment_gid = sref.shipment_gid AND sref.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.SHIPTYPE' INNER JOIN shipment_refnum sr ON s.shipment_gid = sr.shipment_gid AND sr.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' INNER JOIN charter_voyage cv ON 'SCOULAR/NVO.' || sr.shipment_refnum_value = cv.charter_voyage_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr1 ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr1.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr1.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_VOYAGE_NUMBER' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr2 ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr2.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr2.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_VIA_LOCATION_ID' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr3 ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr3.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr3.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_VIA_PORT_OF_DISCHARGE' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_involved_party sip1 ON s.shipment_gid = sip1.shipment_gid AND sip1.involved_party_qual_gid = 'SHIPPER' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_involved_party sip2 ON s.shipment_gid = sip2.shipment_gid AND sip2.involved_party_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.OPS MANAGER' LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc1 ON sip1.involved_party_contact_gid = loc1.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc2 ON s.servprov_gid = loc2.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc3 ON cv.source_location_gid = loc3.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc4 ON cvr2.charter_voyage_refnum_value = loc4.location_xid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc5 ON cv.dest_location_gid = loc5.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc6 ON cvr3.charter_voyage_refnum_value = loc6.location_xid WHERE j.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/NVO' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT js.status_value_gid FROM job_status js WHERE js.status_type_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.JOB_CANCELLED' AND js.status_value_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.JOB_CANCELLED' AND js.job_gid = j.job_gid) AND NOT cv.actual_departure_date IS NULL AND cv.actual_arrival_date IS NULL AND ((:SHIPMENT_TYPE = 'BOTH') OR (:SHIPMENT_TYPE = 'IMPORT' AND sref.shipment_refnum_value = 'IMPORT') OR (:SHIPMENT_TYPE = 'EXPORT' AND sref.shipment_refnum_value = 'EXPORT')) AND ((:REPORT_TYPE = 'ETD' AND (TO_DATE(cv.departure_date,'dd-mm-rr') >= TO_DATE(:START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(cv.departure_date,'dd-mm-rr') <= TO_DATE(:END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'))) OR (:REPORT_TYPE = 'ETA' AND (TO_DATE(cv.arrival_date,'dd-mm-rr') >= TO_DATE(:START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(cv.arrival_date,'dd-mm-rr') <= TO_DATE(:END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')))) ORDER BY cv.departure_date, j.job_xid
